message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer it to you for $900,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $900,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to offer you $750,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $750,000. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $825,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure I'll be able to go any lower.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $825,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to offer you $800,000, which is my absolute maximum budget.  If this is acceptable to you, I'd be happy to finalize the deal.  If not, I might need to explore other options.

I understand that $800,000 is your maximum budget, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable selling the product at that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $815,000. This is as low as I can go, and I'm not sure I'll be able to go any lower. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm ready to finalize the deal.
